question.text: Your motorway journey seems boring and you feel drowsy. What should you do?

explanation.text: Never stop on the hard shoulder to rest. If there is no service station for several miles, leave the motorway at the next exit and find somewhere safe and legal to pull over.

answer.text: Stop on the hard shoulder for a sleep
Open a window and stop as soon as it’s safe and legal
Speed up to arrive at your destination sooner
Slow down and let other drivers overtake
